intro.p: This node performs R-Group decomposition of a given collection of structures, using a scaffold that is common for these structures
This node uses Indigo classes to process structures.

fullDescription.option: Column that contains the scaffold (Indigo query molecule)
This number of R-Group columns is added to the output table. If some molecule in the output set has more R-Groups than the specified limit, a warning is printed.
Each of new R-group columns will be named with this prefix + number (1,2,3,..)

ports.outPort: Same as input, with R-Group columns
Same as input scaffold, but with marked R-sites
